title: 14 Pretty Decorating Ideas You Can Use + Wayfair Way Day Sales!
description: Want to add a little more charm and style to your home? Today I'll share 14 pretty decorating ideas from my home that you can use to refresh yours and decorate with ease!
excerpt: Want to add a little more charm and style to your home? Today I'll share 14 pretty decorating ideas from my home that you can use to refresh yours and decorate with ease!
text: This Post May Contain Affiliate Links. Please Read Our Disclosure Policy here This post is in partnership with Wayfair (contains affiliate links) Wayfair’s Way Day Event runs from April 26–28, with up to 80% off and free shipping on everything! Want to add a little more charm and style to your home? Today I’ll share 14 pretty decorating ideas from my home that you can use to refresh yours and decorate with ease! Before I share the ideas, here’s a list of some of my favorite Wayfair items so you can easily shop the Way Day sale! Click here for above sources Floral Ruffled Pillow (color options) Botanical Dishes Blue and White Chinoiserie Lamp Woven Planter Botanical Utensil Jar Marble Tray Bunny Pitcher Stoneware Mug Set Scalloped Shade Lamp (color and size options) Floral Bunny Pretty Canisters Checkered Shade Lamp Wicker Planters Basket Trunk Console Table Botanical Rug 1. Create a Pretty Seasonal Centerpiece Use this simple centerpiece formula: a tray + a unique vase + greenery + whimsical seasonal statement. I love using my new botanical canisters in creative ways — and discovered that they are a perfect vase for spring flowers! This adorable bunny is the perfect finishing touch for a whimsical centerpiece. Stoneware Mug Set 2. Create pretty moments at home. This darling mug set would be so charming hanging from hooks and will make fun memories for everyone who loves to “choose their own mug” when they are at our home! Outdoor chairs and table set // Wicker Planters/tables (color options and versatile options to arrange them) 3. Create a Pretty Retreat on Your Porch A cafe table for two surrounded by wicker planters will create a pretty destination  for morning coffee—reminiscent of a charming sidewalk cafe! See more clever ways to use these wicker plant stands here! 4. Put Plants in Pretty Baskets It’s such a simple thing to do, but putting plants into attractive baskets makes any space instantly prettier. This basket is one of my favorites for a window or counter. Basket Planter 5. Make Daily Clutter Feel Pretty Let’s face it. When we live with humans, we’ll have every day “stuff” and “clutter” to deal with. No shame there! But we don’t have to look at it every day! I got this stair basket as a pretty spot to toss the daily stuff that needs to go upstairs. It’s not only prettier than a pile, it’s more functional too. 6. Make Every Day Tasks Prettier Why save pretty things in a cabinet for special occasions and keep ugly things out to use every day? Buy pretty things you love and USE THEM! These canisters make it so easy to decorate any space in a *prettier* way every day. 7 inch canister // 5.5 inch canister I love this pretty utensil jar for my dish brushes by the sink, and this marble tray is perfect for catching the daily drips in style! 7. Decorate with Pretty Patterned Pillows Switch out your pillows for fresh patterns and colors—it’s one of the simplest ways to bring personality to any room. This floral ruffled pillow is so adorable (comes in 3 colors). 8. Set up Pretty Places to Store Things Have piles of *not pretty* things sitting around or stuff that just doesn’t have an attractive home base? A pretty laundry basket is the perfect solution! So many ways to use a basket like this. What would you use this for? I’d love to hear your ideas. Basket Trunk // Rug Blue and white chinoiserie lamp 9. Use Pretty Lamps to Decorate Every Room Lamps and lighting are necessities to bring warmth and function to a home, but they also can add a lot of personal style. I have bought quite a few really pretty classic lamps and ceiling lights from Wayfair, you can see them all (and more tips in this post). Checkered Shade Lamp Source: Semi Flush Mount Light // Scalloped Shade Lamp Rug // Lamp // Entry table 10. Style a Pretty Entry Table Welcome guests (and yourself!) with a thoughtfully styled entry table—layer in a cozy lamp, a tray or lidded box for keys, fresh blooms or a small plant, and a few personal touches like books or a framed photo. Spindle Leg Accent Table // Chair // Rug 11. Bring in Pretty Accent Tables Accent tables provide a surface for a drink, a snack, or a book! But a pretty accent table will be more than just functional. It will add texture and style to a room, which is just as important as function! 12. Layer in a Pretty Rug A rug is like a cozy hug for your room—whether it’s a fun pattern or a simple textured weave, it makes the whole space feel more grounded and inviting. A few rugs in our home: My favorite jute/cotton rug // check patterned jute rug // navy patterned rug // floral entry rug // botanical bedroom rug. My favorite jute/cotton rug // Spindle Leg Accent Table // Chair // Rug Check Patterned Jute Rug 13. Set the Table with Pretty Botanical Dishes Botanical dishes are a lovely way to bring the garden indoors—I love seeing these displayed on our plate rack everyday and we use them often! 14. Hang Pretty Botanical Art Botanical art adds soft color and a peaceful, nature-inspired vibe to your home. This is a great set of botanical art (shown above). It comes in a set of six, we used five of them here and another in our living room. More Way Day Finds (click each thumbnail for details):
html:
This Post May Contain Affiliate Links. Please Read Our Disclosure Policy here

This post is in partnership with Wayfair (contains affiliate links)

Wayfair’s Way Day Event runs from April 26–28, with up to 80% off and free shipping on everything!

Want to add a little more charm and style to your home? Today I’ll share 14 pretty decorating ideas from my home that you can use to refresh yours and decorate with ease!

Before I share the ideas, here’s a list of some of my favorite Wayfair items so you can easily shop the Way Day sale!

  1. Floral Ruffled Pillow (color options)
  2. Botanical Dishes
  3. Blue and White Chinoiserie Lamp
  4. Woven Planter
  5. Botanical Utensil Jar
  6. Marble Tray
  7. Bunny Pitcher
  8. Stoneware Mug Set
  9. Scalloped Shade Lamp (color and size options)
  10. Floral Bunny
  11. Pretty Canisters
  12. Checkered Shade Lamp
  13. Wicker Planters
  14. Basket Trunk
  15. Console Table
  16. Botanical Rug

1. Create a Pretty Seasonal Centerpiece

Use this simple centerpiece formula: a tray + a unique vase + greenery + whimsical seasonal statement. I love using my new botanical canisters in creative ways — and discovered that they are a perfect vase for spring flowers!

This adorable bunny is the perfect finishing touch for a whimsical centerpiece.

2. Create pretty moments at home.

This darling mug set would be so charming hanging from hooks and will make fun memories for everyone who loves to “choose their own mug” when they are at our home!

3. Create a Pretty Retreat on Your Porch

A cafe table for two surrounded by wicker planters will create a pretty destination  for morning coffee—reminiscent of a charming sidewalk cafe!

See more clever ways to use these wicker plant stands here!

4. Put Plants in Pretty Baskets

It’s such a simple thing to do, but putting plants into attractive baskets makes any space instantly prettier. This basket is one of my favorites for a window or counter.

5. Make Daily Clutter Feel Pretty

Let’s face it. When we live with humans, we’ll have every day “stuff” and “clutter” to deal with. No shame there! But we don’t have to look at it every day! I got this stair basket as a pretty spot to toss the daily stuff that needs to go upstairs. It’s not only prettier than a pile, it’s more functional too.

6. Make Every Day Tasks Prettier

Why save pretty things in a cabinet for special occasions and keep ugly things out to use every day? Buy pretty things you love and USE THEM! These canisters make it so easy to decorate any space in a *prettier* way every day.

7 inch canister // 5.5 inch canister

I love this pretty utensil jar for my dish brushes by the sink, and this marble tray is perfect for catching the daily drips in style!

7. Decorate with Pretty Patterned Pillows

Switch out your pillows for fresh patterns and colors—it’s one of the simplest ways to bring personality to any room. This floral ruffled pillow is so adorable (comes in 3 colors).

8. Set up Pretty Places to Store Things

Have piles of *not pretty* things sitting around or stuff that just doesn’t have an attractive home base? A pretty laundry basket is the perfect solution! So many ways to use a basket like this. What would you use this for? I’d love to hear your ideas.

9. Use Pretty Lamps to Decorate Every Room

Lamps and lighting are necessities to bring warmth and function to a home, but they also can add a lot of personal style. I have bought quite a few really pretty classic lamps and ceiling lights from Wayfair, you can see them all (and more tips in this post).

Source: Semi Flush Mount Light // Scalloped Shade Lamp

10. Style a Pretty Entry Table

Welcome guests (and yourself!) with a thoughtfully styled entry table—layer in a cozy lamp, a tray or lidded box for keys, fresh blooms or a small plant, and a few personal touches like books or a framed photo.

11. Bring in Pretty Accent Tables

Accent tables provide a surface for a drink, a snack, or a book! But a pretty accent table will be more than just functional. It will add texture and style to a room, which is just as important as function!

12. Layer in a Pretty Rug

A rug is like a cozy hug for your room—whether it’s a fun pattern or a simple textured weave, it makes the whole space feel more grounded and inviting.

A few rugs in our home: My favorite jute/cotton rug // check patterned jute rug // navy patterned rug // floral entry rug // botanical bedroom rug.

13. Set the Table with Pretty Botanical Dishes

Botanical dishes are a lovely way to bring the garden indoors—I love seeing these displayed on our plate rack everyday and we use them often!

14. Hang Pretty Botanical Art

Botanical art adds soft color and a peaceful, nature-inspired vibe to your home. This is a great set of botanical art (shown above). It comes in a set of six, we used five of them here and another in our living room.

More Way Day Finds (click each thumbnail for details):
